mosinstall.name: ListSubscribe
mosinstall.author: Tobias Gesellchen
mosinstall.description:
A Mailman Subscriber module. © Tobias Gesellchen, www.gesellix.de

After installation, your Subscription module is not yet active and needs to be configured. To activate it, go to the Module Manager and click on ListSubscribe to configure and publish this module.

You have to configure in the following fields:

  • Mail address
  • Mail from

Default mode to communicate with Mailman is by its mail interface. That way, the subscriber will receive a confirmation mail from Mailman before being subscribed to the list.
If you prefer to directly subscribe email addresses, you have to fill the fields

  • Mailman admin url
  • ailman admin password
This module will then simulate the Mailman administrator using the mass mail option. The subscriber will get a welcome mail without the need to confirm his action.

param.name: introduction
param.label: Introduction
param.description: A small descriptive introduction above the subscribe form (optional).

param.name: requestto
param.label: Mail address
param.description: Where shall the request mail be sent to?

param.name: mailfrom
param.label: Mail from
param.description: Any valid sender address. This should be the address of the list-owner.

param.name: defaultpass
param.label: Default password
param.description: Default user password for the Mailman interface (optional). DON'T enter the admin password!

param.name: mailmanurl
param.label: Mailman admin url
param.description: URL for the Mailman admin interface. Optional, but has to be set, when a Mailman admin password is set!

param.name: mailmanadminpass
param.label: Mailman admin password
param.description: Password for the Mailman admin interface. When empty, the subscriber is sent a confirmation mail to complete the subscription.
